name: SPEC_APPLIED_PROC_LAT
description: This table stores the laterality for the specimen retrieval procedure.

columns.name: RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: APPLIED_PROCEDURE_LAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the laterality of the specimen retrieval.
